#{theme},

mapper.update:
UPDATE emailTemplate
id = #{id},
theme = #{theme},
content = #{content},
sender = #{sender},
senderName = #{senderName},
receiver = #{receiver},
receiverName = #{receiverName},
copyTo = #{copyTo},
email = #{email},
statusSend = #{statusSend},
type = #{type},
addDate = #{addDate},
addUser = #{addUser},
addIp = #{addIp},
modifiedDate = #{modifiedDate},
modifiedUser = #{modifiedUser},
modifiedIp = #{modifiedIp},
WHERE
AND modified = #{original}
